name: Five Minute Hoagie
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 113: Five Minute Hero.

You need to make sandwiches for the customers who come into your shop. Unfortunately they won't just tell you want they want.  

Try making a sandwich and check to see if you got the correct ingredients in the correct positions.  The customers will at least indicate if you have any ingredients correctly placed or any correct ingredients in the wrong place.  

You have five minutes until the customer gets impatient and leaves.  

Click and drag to put ingredients in the sandwich.
